description: Detects the execution node.exe which is shipped with multiple softwares such as VMware, Adobe...etc. In order to execute arbitrary code. For example to establish reverse shell as seen in Log4j attacks...etc
name: Node.exe Process Abuse
query: (process.executable.text:*\\node.exe AND process.command_line.text:(*\ \-e\ * OR *\ \-\-eval\ *) AND process.command_line.text:*.exec\(* AND process.command_line.text:*net.socket* AND process.command_line.text:*.connect* AND process.command_line.text:*child_process*)
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
